title: #75 - Will Evangelia Go to Eurovision?
description:
This week, Maria is talking to singer and songwriter Evangelia!

She grew up commuting between her grandmother’s small farm on the Greek island of Crete and her parents’ home in New Jersey. Two completely different music worlds, both of which influenced her style. Her music blends modern pop music with sounds from her Greek roots, contemporary club beats and catchy melodies by fusing American pop culture with traditional Greek elements.

Follow Evangelia on TikTok at https://www.tiktok.com/@evangeliamusic

Follow Evangelia on Instagram at https://www.instagram.com/evangelia/

Want to join an upcoming Agape Intensive? 2022 dates just announced! http://agapeintensive.com

Follow Maria on Instagram to find out when the Matchmaker Hotline will be open to talk! http://instagram.com/matchmakermaria 

Follow Agape Match on Instagram at http://instagram.com/agapematch

Follow the podcast on Instagram at http://instagram.com/askamatchmaker
author: maria@agapematch.com (Maria Avgitidis)
